title: Wanting to find a rank team to have some fun
body:
Hey guys,
Just recently i find that if i aint screwing around trying champs for first time in ranked that it is always the team that lets me down and am looking to have a ranked team to be apart of. I aint a pro at league but just looking for a team that wants a diverse player that can be a back up in case someone is out :) hit me up

replies.body:
Hey just added you in game
HMU
